name: .RMP File Extension
summary: Learn about .RMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Playlist file primarily used by RealPlayer, a multimedia playback application; stores a music playlist using XML formatting; commonly used for sharing song playlists with others over the Internet; also used by music distributors when publishing music information.

content: RMP files include remote server information where multimedia files can be downloaded or streamed. They also store metadata for individual tracks, such as the title, album, artist, genre, filename, size, format, and quality.
NOTE: Only version 16 and earlier of RealNetworks RealPlayer supports RMP files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
